message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product is significant to you, but I believe I can't justify the price of $12000. Would you consider lowering the price to $10000? I think that would be a fair compromise.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to get a good return on my investment. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value I place on the product.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still feel that $11500 is slightly out of my budget. Could we possibly meet at $11000? This would allow me to purchase the product without straining my finances too much.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm willing to meet you at $11000, but I need to get closer to my original price. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $11250. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your last offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I still believe that $11250 might be a bit high for me. I am willing to pay up to $11000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
